is there any readily available programme that lets me rip my DVDs to my hardrive? Ones i've bought legally of course, I avoid pirate DVDs like they are the plague.

http://www.magicdvdripper.com/
 
 Haven't used it myself, but it says that the free trial version is fully functional.

It's too bad that they killed DvD Decrypter, it really was the best thing out there.
 
 Its replacement can be found here: http://www.dvdidle.com/free.htm

forum.digital-digest.com/
 
 You can still find DVD Decrypter in there. It works wonders.
 DVD Shrink is still around you can find it in the site I linked to you.
 You should be able to find anything you could possibly need for videos, and such.
I need to get me one of these!
is there any legitimate use of these softwares?
Yes, it allows you to backup your own DVD's to your computer for storage/burning/your hearts content. DVD Decrypter and DVD Shrink should be the only tools you'll need.

I use mac the ripper on my iMac and then DVD2OneX to compress them.
 much more simple and automated than the Windows programs I have used on my PC.
